titleStmt.title: Rhann o Psalmæ Dauyd, a phrophwydti [sic] eraill, gweddi i kynghanedhu [sic] mewn [--].
titleStmt.author: Myddelton, William, 1556?-1621.

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: fragment; part of quire A only, bound and filmed out of order, ending with A₃.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Wales.
